title: Start Date
name: startDate
description: All events should have a start date. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD or date-time format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.

title: End Date
name: endDate
description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in months) or an end date. Dates should be in YYYY-MM-DD or date-time format. If the month or day are not available, these may be omitted.

title: Duration (months)
name: duration
description: Events or activities lasting more than one day should have either a duration (in months) or an end date.

title: Last modified
name: dateModified
description: When was information about this event last modified? A full date-time should be given. Usually this can be generated automatically by the software managing or exporting this data.
